title: La fièvre d'Urbicande
description: Belgian artist Francois Schuiten, considered a master fantasy illustrator, is best known for his exquisite, technically rendered architecture. This prowess is showcased in Fever in Urbicand. Schuiten and long-time writing collaborator Benoit Peeters draft a fantastic tale of intrigue about a mysterious small cube that exponentially expands into an indestructible city-engulfing lattice. Join the search to learn the cube's secret and at the same time marvel at one of Europe's master draughtsmen.
author: François Schuiten
